alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 12:54AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Comanche, southwestern Caddo, northwestern Cotton, southeastern Kiowa, eastern Jackson, Tillman, northwestern Archer, western Wichita, southeastern Foard, southeastern Hardeman, Knox, Wilbarger and Baylor Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1254 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cooperton to 3 miles southeast of Vernon to 7 miles northeast of Gilliland to 9 miles west of Benjamin. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Lawton, Vernon, Frederick, Seymour, Munday, Knox City, Benjamin, Cache, Electra, Apache, Snyder, Grandfield, Tipton, Chattanooga, Mountain Park, Medicine Park, Indiahoma, Davidson, Goree, and Manitou. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 44 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This wind shift will affect fire fighting efforts. Please advise fire crews in the field of the change in wind direction. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Archer; Baylor; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger
